mainBoard.name: Scorn-Blade Berserker
mainBoard.originalText:
Backup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)
{1}, Sacrifice this creature: Draw a card.

rulings.text: Backup confers only abilities that are actually printed below it. Any abilities that are gained by the permanent are ignored, including abilities gained due to a resolving spell or ability or copy effects.
If a backup ability causes another creature to gain abilities, the creature with backup will still have those abilities.
If a backup ability targets the creature with backup, that creature will get +1/+1 counters, but it won’t gain additional abilities.
If a permanent enters the battlefield as a copy of a card with a backup ability or a token is created that is a copy of that card, the order of the printed abilities is maintained.

The abilities that backup grants to the target creature are determined only once, at the time the ability triggers. They won’t change if the permanent with backup loses any abilities before the backup ability resolves.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.flavorText: Takumi knew where all the bodies were buried. After all, he'd buried most of them.

foreignData.flavorText: Takumi wusste, wo alle Leichen begraben waren. Schließlich hatte er die meisten davon begraben.
foreignData.name: Schrecken von Towashi
foreignData.text:
Todesberührung
Immer wenn der Schrecken von Towashi angreift, kannst du {3}{B} bezahlen. Wenn du dies tust, bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück. Sie ist zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen ein Phyrexianer.

foreignData.flavorText: Takumi sabía dónde estaban sepultados todos los cuerpos. Al fin y al cabo, había enterrado a la mayoría.
foreignData.name: Terror de Towashi
foreignData.text:
Toque mortal.
Siempre que el Terror de Towashi ataque, puedes pagar {3}{B}. Cuando lo hagas, regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio al campo de batalla. Es un Pirexiano además de sus otros tipos.

foreignData.flavorText: Takumi savait où tous les corps étaient inhumés. Après tout, il avait enterré la plupart d'entre eux.
foreignData.name: Terreur de Towashi
foreignData.text:
Contact mortel
À chaque fois que la Terreur de Towashi attaque, vous pouvez payer {3}{B}. Quand vous faites ainsi, renvoyez sur le champ de bataille une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière. C'est un phyrexian en plus de ses autres types.

foreignData.flavorText: Takumi sapeva dove erano seppelliti tutti i corpi. Dopotutto, ne aveva seppellito la maggior parte.
foreignData.name: Terrore di Towashi
foreignData.text:
Tocco letale
Ogniqualvolta il Terrore di Towashi attacca, puoi pagare {3}{B}. Quando lo fai, rimetti sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero. È un Phyrexiano in aggiunta ai suoi altri tipi.

foreignData.flavorText: 拓巳は遺体が埋まっている場所を、全て心得ていた。それもそのはず、殆どは彼が埋葬したのだから。
foreignData.name: 都和市の恐怖
foreignData.text:
接死
都和市の恐怖が攻撃するたび、あなたは{3}{B}を支払ってもよい。そうしたとき、あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。それを戦場に戻す。それは、それの他のタイプに加えてファイレクシアンでもある。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・オーガ

foreignData.flavorText: Takumi sabia onde todos os corpos estavam enterrados. Afinal, ele tinha enterrado a maioria.
foreignData.name: Terror de Towashi
foreignData.text:
Toque mortífero
Toda vez que Terror de Towashi ataca, você pode pagar {3}{B}. Quando fizer isso, devolva o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha. Ele é um Phyrexiano além de seus outros tipos.

foreignData.flavorText: 拓巳知道尸体都埋在哪里。毕竟当初基本上都是他埋的。
foreignData.name: 都和市惧魔
foreignData.text:
死触
每当都和市惧魔攻击时，你可以支付{3}{B}。当你如此作时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它额外具有非瑞人此类别。
foreignData.type: 生物 — 非瑞人／食人魔

mainBoard.name: Terror of Towashi
mainBoard.originalText:
Deathtouch
Whenever Terror of Towashi attacks, you may pay {3}{B}. When you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It's a Phyrexian in addition to its other types.

rulings.text: If the creature stops being a creature after the ability has resolved, it will also stop being a Phyrexian until it becomes a creature again, if applicable.

Terror of Towashi’s triggered ability triggers and goes on the stack without a target. If you pay {3}{B}, the second “reflexive” triggered ability will trigger. You’ll choose the target creature card for that second ability at that time.
The effect making the creature a Phyrexian doesn’t have a duration. It lasts until the creature leaves the battlefield.
